channel.title: Need help with taking quests out
channel.description:
1. can anyone plz help me i am wondering how to take quests out it says that i have to complete a quest to use dragon weapons and for magic etc. how do i take them out plzz help.
2. also how do i make non existing items like regualar items because it says my d claws are non existing plzz help.
thanks, smerf45 :)
